Package com.codeEra.code_era.controller

Class BugController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeEra.code_era.controller.BugController
  • @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:3000","http://localhost:4200"})
@Controller
@RestController
public class BugController
extends java.lang.Object
    APIs to create, retrieve, update, and delete Bug objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllItems

        @GetMapping("/{username}/bugs/")
public java.util.List<Bug> getAllItems​(@PathVariable
                                       java.lang.String username,
                                       org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        GET API for retrieving all Bugs from the data store.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of this author
        pageable - the list to store the retrieved Bugs
        Returns:
        all the Bugs in the data store

      • getItem

        @GetMapping("/{username}/bugs/{id}")
public Bug getItem​(@PathVariable
                   java.lang.String username,
                   @PathVariable
                   long id)
        GET API for retrieving a Bug by Bug.id.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the author
        id - the ID of the Bug to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the Bug found in the data store with the ID

      • createItem

        @PostMapping("/{username}/bugs/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Bug> createItem​(@PathVariable
                                                               java.lang.String username,
                                                               @RequestBody
                                                               Bug item)
        POST API for creating a Bug object in the data store.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the author
        item - the input item to bee created
        Returns:
        Server response indicating the item is created

      • updateItem

        @PutMapping("/{username}/bugs/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Bug> updateItem​(@PathVariable
                                                               java.lang.String username,
                                                               @PathVariable
                                                               long id,
                                                               @RequestBody
                                                               Bug postRequest)
        PUT API for updating a Bug object in the data store.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the author
        id - the ID of the Bug to be updated
        postRequest - the input item from the frontend
        Returns:
        Server response indicating the item is updated
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - return the message that the item cannot be found

      • deleteItem

        @DeleteMapping("/{username}/bugs/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteItem​(@PathVariable
                                                             java.lang.String username,
                                                             @PathVariable
                                                             long id)
        DELETE API for deleting a Bug object in the data store.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the author
        id - the ID of the Bug to be deleted
        Returns:
        Server response indicating the item is deleted
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - return the message that the item cannot be found
